title: ISic020467. ISic020467
body:
1Ἀλκιμίδας κ<α>ὶ Μοσχίνα

1ΑΛΚΙΜΙΔΑΣΚΙΜΟΣΧΙΝΑ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena (IGASM 2) ;
  • Dubois: Ἀλκιμίδας

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The first name occurs in ISic020463 in the dative case (or nominative plural if it is to be understood as the name of a genos). The second noun occurs, as Arena notes, also in the feminine form in Athens, Illyria, Delos and Kos. See also IG II(2) 9319, from Megara (IV c. BC); I.Epidamnos 316, from Epidamnos-Dyrrhachion (III-II c. BC); I.Bouthrotos 99, from Epeiros (II c. BC).

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 20, pl.VIII.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Dubois 1989 144e https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • 16.0554 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
